questions.text: If 3x + 7 = 22, what is the value of x?
questions.explanation: To solve 3x + 7 = 22, subtract 7 from both sides to get 3x = 15, then divide by 3 to find x = 5.

questions.text: What is the area of a circle with radius 6 cm?
questions.explanation: The area of a circle is πr², where r is the radius. So the area is π × 6² = 36π cm².

questions.text: What is the derivative of f(x) = x³ + 2x² - 4x + 7?
questions.explanation: The derivative of f(x) = x³ + 2x² - 4x + 7 is f'(x) = 3x² + 4x - 4 using the power rule for each term.

questions.text: In a normal distribution, approximately what percentage of data falls within one standard deviation of the mean?
questions.explanation: In a normal distribution, approximately 68% of the data falls within one standard deviation of the mean.

questions.text: If you roll two fair six-sided dice, what is the probability of rolling a sum of 7?
questions.explanation: There are 6 ways to roll a sum of 7 (1+6, 2+5, 3+4, 4+3, 5+2, 6+1) out of 36 possible combinations, so the probability is 6/36 = 1/6.

What is the volume of a rectangular prism with length 5 cm, width 3 cm, and height 4 cm?
questions.explanation: The volume of a rectangular prism is length × width × height. So the volume is 5 × 3 × 4 = 60 cm³.

questions.text: What is the integral of f(x) = 2x + 5?
questions.explanation: The integral of f(x) = 2x + 5 is x² + 5x + C, where C is the constant of integration.

questions.text: Which measure of central tendency is most affected by outliers?
questions.explanation: The mean is most affected by outliers because it takes into account the value of each data point. The median and mode are less affected by extreme values.

questions.text: If you have a bag with 3 red marbles, 4 blue marbles, and 5 green marbles, what is the probability of drawing a red marble?
questions.explanation: There are 3 + 4 + 5 = 12 marbles in total, and 3 of them are red. So the probability of drawing a red marble is 3/12 = 1/4.
